thread.title: Andrew James Premium Coffee Machine only £74.99
thread.title_full: Andrew James Premium Coffee Machine only £74.99 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Andrew James Premium Coffee Machine only £74.99
text: Telegraph readers can claim an Andrew James Premium Coffee Machine for only £74.99, RRP £99.99 Every true coffee connoisseur knows you can’t beat a freshly brewed cup made from freshly ground beans. With the Andrew James Premium Filter Coffee Maker with Integrated Grinder, you can turn beans into delicious fresh coffee in a matter of minutes, and have your brew made ready whenever you need it thanks to a programmable timer. The machine can produce between two and 12 cups of coffee and will keep the carafe warm for up to 30 minutes after brewing, so you can go back for as many refills as you like. This incredible gadget has an RRP of £99.99, and is available exclusively to Telegraph readers for only £74.99. How to Claim To claim your coffee machine for only £74.99, click here , and add the coffee machine to your basket, using code AJTELEGRAPH at the checkout. Terms and Conditions 1. One Premium Filter Coffee Maker With Integrated Grinder per customer. 2. Subject to availability, while stocks last. 3. Voucher is valid until Thursday 3rd September, 2015 and can only be redeemed at www.andrewjamesworldwide.com. 4. Voucher offers cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotional voucher, and vouchers can only be redeemed once. 5. No cash alternative can be offered. 6. Andrew James UK Ltd reserves the right to suspend the voucher code at any time. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
